ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Chandra G has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 9 years. Currently he is employed as a Technical Architect/Lead Developer at State Farm. Chandra has extensive knowledge of XML, WSDL, Java Server Pages, SQL, JavaScript, Struts Web Application Framework, SOAP, HTML, Spring Framework, Log4j, Java Servlets, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, Enterprise Java Beans, Web Services, JDBC, Hibernate, Apache Wicket, Java, JUnit, JNDI, Data Access Object, Ant, AJAX, Rational Rose, Rational ClearQuest, MVC, Jboss, IBM WebSphere Application Server, DB2, CVS, jQuery, XHTML, WebSphere MQ, WebLogic Enterprise Application Server, UML/OMT, Stored Procedures, StarTeam, Software Development Life Cycle, Rational ClearCase, ProVision, Java Messaging Service, Jakarta TOMCAT Servlet Engine, IBM WebSphere, Cascading Style Sheets, Bugzilla, Apache Subversion, Apache Maven, Apache Axis, shell scripting, XSLT, UNIX, SDLC, SAX, Relational Database, RUP, RSA 7.0, Oracle PL/SQL, Oracle, Object Oriented Analysis/Design, Microsoft SQL Server 2005, Microsoft SQL Server 2000, Microsoft SQL Server, Linux, JSTL, Document Object Model, Class Diagrams, Agile Methodology, XSL, WebSphere Studio Application Developer, UDDI, Service Oriented Architecture, Sequence Diagrams, STS, SQL Query Analyzer, PostgreSQL, My Eclipse, Mule ESB, Microsoft Transact-SQL, Microsoft Access, JPA, ITIL, Framework, FTP, DML, Activity Diagrams. Chandra has a considerable management experience (2.9 years).
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Since 2009-08 for 35 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Java/J2EE Lead Developer/Lead Developer at United Services Automobile Association.
